p: OTU level community compositions are shown in Fig. 4b. It is worth highlighting that a single OTU (OTU01), classified as a Photobacterium species, represented 30% of the total sequences in the 12 cod samples (Fig. 4b). This OTU represented 71% of all sequences classified as Vibrionales. OTUs assigned to the orders Deferribacterales (OTU02), Vibrionales ( Aliivibrio species) (OTU03) and Bacteriodales (family Porphyromonadaceae) (OTU04) were also abundant.
